text: can somebody help me with the following piece of the code:

code:
try:
    #do some things
    myClass.close()
except Exception, error:
    myClass.close()
    raise error

text: as You see I can't use here finally because in that case I will not know if an error actually occured, and I need to raise this error (raise error)
my question is how can I avoid using this two times myClass.close()?
thanks in advance for any help
